Package org.lwjgl.nanovg

Class NSVGGradient

java.lang.Object
org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
org.lwjgl.system.Struct
org.lwjgl.nanovg.NSVGGradient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Pointer
public class NSVGGradient extends Struct

Layout


 struct NSVGgradient {
     float xform[6];
     char spread;
     float fx;
     float fy;
     int nstops;
     NSVGgradientStop pstops[1];
 }

  • Constructor Details

    • NSVGGradient

      public NSVGGradient(ByteBuffer container)
      Creates a NSVGGradient instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

      The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
